title: Some friends of mine,
author: Lucas, E. V.
snippet: Lord K. declined, and drew back, saying, "By no means, my lord; you may walk first, that I may see your tail." -1 recollect Lord Monboddo's coming to dine at Fasque caused a great excitement of interest and curiosity.
